Julien Minguely

multimedia and other stuff

About→ Video→ Music→
Instagram Vimeo Github Mail

Julien Minguely is a swiss multidisciplinary artist, based in Fribourg (CH)

Interested in all forms of interactive arts, his works tries to merge technology and storytelling to create unique pieces of art for various medium: videoclip, live concert, installations, websites, apps…

Experiences

2005-2009

Diploma in Informatic Science, specialization in Software and Web development

2011-2014

Diploma in interactive media design at eikon (Fribourg)

2014-2018

Bachelor of Arts in Music in Jazz at the Hochschule Luzern, Drumset and composition

2012-present

Director and editor for the Montreux Jazz Festival

2016-2019

Frontend development and UI animation at Antistatique.net (Lausanne)

2018-present

TV Director for the chanel UPC Sunrise Mysports.

2020-present

Vocational Teacher (Frontend Development, Video and Motion Design) at eikon (Fribourg)

Competences

Languages

Français, English, Deutsch

Software

Adobe Photoshop, InDesign, Illustrator, Bridge, Premiere, After Effect, Sketch, Final Cut, Modul8, Resolume, MadMapper, ProTools, Linux, Apple, Ableton Live

Development

Java, C#, HTML5, CSS3, Sass, Javascript, jQuery, NodeJS, PHP, Symfony, Wordpress, Drupal, Typo3, React, GatsbyJS, GraphQL, Lottie Bodymovin, Vuejs, Nuxt
